thread.title: Tom Bergeron pays an emotional tribute to his late father
thread.title_full: Tom Bergeron pays an emotional tribute to his late father

title: Tom Bergeron pays an emotional tribute to his late father
text: Tom Bergeron pays an emotional tribute to his late father Tuesday, 13 October 2015 (11 minutes ago) The host made an emotional return to "Dancing with the Stars" on Monday after missing last week's episode to be by his ailing father's side There wasn't a dry eye in the audience as the 17-year-old honored her late father Steve Irwin with a contemporary dance. Recent related news The longtime host honored his father's legacy with a heartfelt tribute on Monday's 'Dancing With the Stars.' Entertainment Tonight 9 hours ago - Celebrities "My dad loved this show. Never missed an episode. And I'd like to think somewhere that he didn't miss this one," said Bergeron People Magazine 11 hours ago - Celebrities You Might Like
